text: Hagi nagra Nehemaia'na kva nagara, kuma keginamofo agofetu zamazeri atru hute'na, Ra Anumzamofontegama muse zagamema hu'za agima hentesgama hanaza vahera tarefi refko hu'noe. Hagi ana hutogeno mago kevumo'a nazantmaga kaziga kegina agofetu vu'za Kumapinti zama harafima hu'zama ome atre kafanema nehaza kafante vu'naze.
